ee kiyamana koyi tharam gambauruyida...apuruyida...mata eka thathparayakatawath sheli nowi, aya gatha karana jiwithaya, aya edineda muhuna de gana hithannatawath ayithiyak thiyanawada?...apita puluwanda pitastharayek widiyata anikage sapaththuwa mona tharam duk kam katolu uhulagaththadayi anumana karanna...ehi mona tharam aadaraya, gaurawaya, kapa kirim piri athdayi danaganna...eya danaganimata nam oba ee sapaththuwa palandiya yuthumayi..oba aneka gatha karana lesa sama thathparayakma gewa damiya yuthumayi...ee hara, obata kisima ayithiyak naha, anika dutu pamanin ho yamak asu pamanin, purwa nigamana walata elambaenna...
